titleStmt.title: Two treatises the first proving both by history & record that the bishops are a fundamental & essential part of our English Parliament : the second that they may be judges in capital cases.
titleStmt.author: Womock, Laurence, 1612-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Braddyll for Robert Clavell ...,

notesStmt.note: The second treatise has special t.p. and separate paging.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
